::Epyon::

He got the message from Alpha's ship. He opened a comm.
"I'm watching Eyebright for Starice, so I can't come out there. Come on
in, some one will help you." He then got the message from Khonklor. 
"Yes, Khonklor, you may enter the competition. I have also entered."

::Hot Rod::

He looked up at the confused Starice.
"Dont worry, we are training. These are stun weapons."

OOC: Later today I am leaving and I'm not sure how long I will be gone.
It could be up to a week. Since DrillBit is in battle, I leave him to
Yan. Also Hot Rod and Epyon, but Yan, keep Hot Rod training. if it ends,
have him train for the IGL. Same with Epyon when he is done watching
Eyebright. Since KitKat2 is sleeping we will just leave her alone.
Thanks! I will still be posting for most of the day though.
